CatchAllEntryPoint.description: Entrypoint that catches all user messages
CatchAllEntryPoint.title: CatchAllEntryPoint

ContentBlock.description:
Simplest user flow block: static content sent by bot in one or several telegram messages.
Immediately continues to the next block after sending the content.
ContentBlock.title: ContentBlock

FormBlock.description: Block with a series of questions to user with options to export their answers in various formats
FormBlock.title: FormBlock

FormFieldConfig.description: Wrapper object for all kinds of fields; see individual classes for details on each field's specifics
FormFieldConfig.title: FormFieldConfig

HumanOperatorBlock.description: Terminal block that incapsulates user interaction with a human operator
HumanOperatorBlock.title: HumanOperatorBlock

LanguageSelectBlock.description:
Language selection menu block. If specified, all texts in the containing user flow must be multilang
and be translated to all of the supported languages. Only one such block is permitted per user flow.
LanguageSelectBlock.title: LanguageSelectBlock

MenuBlock.description: Multilevel menu block powered by Telegram inline buttons
MenuBlock.title: MenuBlock

RegexMatchEntryPoint.description: Entrypoint matching user messages by searching a regex pattern in text
RegexMatchEntryPoint.title: RegexMatchEntryPoint

TgBotUser.description: Info on telegram bot, combining info from several Bot API endpoints
TgBotUser.title: TgBotUser

description: Temporary class to pack several models into one schema; not used directly by frontend code
title: BackendDataModels
